trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Beach Park
There were no other sightings in Beach Park on or around November 2nd 2009
Summary: Extremely bright object lights up hoovers then drifts off to the east.
divs: sighting detailsi was upstairs in my room playing guitar when i had glanced at the moon because i noticed it was full. when all of the sudden right in front of the moon a very bright light lit up, arc welder type bright and i guess compared to the moon it was a little bigger or similar size to the ink jacket in a bic pen so this thing just blinks on stays where it is for a few seconds and drifts off. i ran down stairs to see if i could maybe here anything but i could not. how ever i go back up to my room and had been watching out when two of these things blinked on again this time just under the moon dirfted over to the east again once again i went down stairs to see if i could here\see more but nothing. i could not make out any sort of shape to these objects just very bright balls of light.
